attributes.action: Reverse the decision by TFL denying Uber a license to operate in London
attributes.background: Uber has been a huge benefit to so many people seeking affordable journeys across London. A fantastic easy to use app. The decision to deny them a license to operate in London not only deprives consumers of choice but will also effect the 10s of thousands of people who make a living through Uber.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
